CWEs: CWE-602: Client-Side Enforcement of Server-Side Security
description: The function is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR) because it uses user-supplied input in direct object references without proper authorization checks. This can allow an attacker to bypass authorization and directly access data. The function also lacks server-side validation for some of its inputs, relying on client-side validation instead. This can be easily bypassed, leading to potential security issues.
